events.text:
[wave amp=10 freq=50][color=#FA0000]LOOK OUT!!![/color][/wave]
There is a spidery foe ahead, and they are called...
[color=#FA0000]Tekies![/color]
stay out of their line of sight, or else they will start jumping at you
but do not fret...
[wave amp=10 freq=50][color=#FA0000]SWING YOUR SWORD BEFORE IT STRIKES YOU!!![/color][/wave]
Do that by pressing the letter O
